content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Iron Plate Production at (1,1) and (3,1)
Two stone furnaces have been placed and are actively smelting iron ore into iron plates:
- Stone furnace at position (1,1) containing 23 coal as fuel, 1 iron ore as input, and 18 iron plates as output
- Stone furnace at position (3,1) containing 23 coal as fuel, 1 iron ore as input, and 18 iron plates as output

###Iron Ore Mining at (-15,-54)
A burner mining drill has been placed to mine iron ore:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15,-54) facing downward
- Currently not operational due to lack of fuel
- Mining from an iron ore patch containing 40000 ore
- Drop-off position at (-14.5,-52.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Error when trying to craft items requiring assembly or smelting
- Items like iron plates and iron gear wheels cannot be directly crafted in inventory
- These items require either a furnace (for smelting ore into plates) or an assembling machine (for crafting intermediate products like iron gear wheels)
- Ensure you have the appropriate production structure (furnace/assembling machine) before attempting to craft these items

### Error when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Check if you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it
- Craft the required entity first if it's not available in inventory

### Error when inserting fuel into entities
- Ensure you have the required fuel type (coal) in your inventory before attempting to insert it into machines
- Collect coal first before trying to fuel burner mining drills or furnaces
